Mon - Monday, August 19, 2024 (100 places listed).

km - distance in kilometers from Kroonstad

miles - distance in statute miles from Kroonstad. One statute mile = 1609.344 meters.

nm - distance in nautical miles from Kroonstad. One nautical mile = 1852 meters.

All numbers are ellipsoidal distance, WGS84 reference ellipsoid.
